05.2
Применение масштаба
scaleNumber: (number, scale) ->
 Math.max(Math.round(number * scale), 1)
 
scaleFont: (font, scale) ->
 font.replace /\d+px/g, (match) =>
  @scaleNumber(parseInt(match), scale) + 'px'
  
applyScale: (style, scale) ->
 css = _.copy style
 css.sizes.headerHeight = @scaleNumber css.sizes.headerHeight, scale
 ...
 css.fonts.main = @scaleFont css.fonts.main, scale
 ...
